message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth every penny of its $12000 price tag. To make this opportunity more appealing, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $10800. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information.
